name: ILCD format
description:
The format schema files, stylesheets, further documentation and supporting files as well as license conditions are available in the
    developer support package, accessible currently at http://lca.jrc.ec.europa.eu
textReference:
European Commission, Joint Research Centre, Institute for Environment and Sustainability (JRC-IES); Forschungszentrum Karlsruhe, Institute for Applied
    Computer Science (FZK-IAI); Brasilian Ministry of Science and Technology, Brazilian Institute of Information in Science and Technology (IBICT) (2009): International
    Reference Life Cycle Data System (ILCD) data set format.
